title: The tragedie of Alceste and Eliza As it is found in Italian, in La Croce racquistata. Collected, and translated into English, in the same verse, and number, by Fr. Br. Gent. At the request of the right vertuous lady, the Lady Anne Wingfield ...
author: Bracciolini, Francesco, 1566-1645.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Th. Harper, for Iohn Waterson, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Crown,
